title: Thorndyke: Forensic Investigator - Series 1
description:
5 X 15 mins

Written in the early part of the last century, these 5 short stories feature "forensic investigator" Thorndyke who solves crimes - like Sherlock Holmes - by careful analysis of the clues. Not as devious as Sherlock Holmes, these are nonetheless quite clever and have survived the test of time.

Series 2 to be uploaded in due course, after they have passed my "quality check".
